analyzed: tathā ca tatra ṣoḍaśa varṣa ava dheḥ jñāna pūjā anurāgaṇam evam tatra kāle tad svabhāva ātmakaḥ u ham iti vaktavyam atra utpatti krame bhagavataḥ niyamaḥ iti

original: ṣaḍaṅgayogaścātra samāsāduddiṣṭo nītārthaḥ

original: tato nābhau nirmāṇacakre śrīkālacakra bhagavatsādhanavidhiḥ pañcaṣaṣṭiśūkaṃ vajraṃ dhyātvā tasya varaṭake cāmuṇḍādi' bhīmādidevatāṃ visarjayet

original: tathaiva nāgaśvānāsyādidevatā: kriyācakreṣu saptaśukāni vajrāṇi bhāvayitvā tadvaraṭakeṣu visarjayet

original: tathā ca tatra - aṣṭau dhūmādidevī: visarjayitvā'ṣṭau ghaṭān śaṅkhādikañca jinapatikamale kadācit śrīcakraṃ cittamaṇḍalaṃ garbhamadhye bhavati narapate pañcaviṃśātmakañca, upaviṣṭo'pi tadā bhagavān bhavati śrīsamājavat

original: atra doṣo nāsti niranvayatvāt

original: tatpātrādvindunā vai śaśikarakamalānāmikāgreṇa bhūmyāṃ kṛtvā bāhye trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulaṃ tasya madhye
analyzed: tad pātrāt vindunā vai śaśi kara kamala anāmikā agreṇa bhūmyām kṛtvā bāhye trikoṇam dinakara sadṛśam vartulam tasya madhye

original: deśagrāmādhipānāṃ prathamamiha valiṃ cādimadhyāntanāmnā hārītyā: piṇḍake dve punarapi ca valiṃ krodharājāya mantrī

analyzed: dūtīnām grāsam agram kṣiti tala nilaye bhartṛ vatraiḥ dadāti bhūtānām bhukta śeṣam paṭhati punar imām dāna gāthām śubha arthām

original: aṅganyāsaṃ svavajaiḥ śirasi galahṛdornābhiguhye ca mūrdhni nidrākāle'ṅgavakauru bhayakulagatairarcane maithune ca

original: tathā ca tatra - karasaṃpuṭaṃ kṛtvā'ṅguṣṭhau śliṣṭau kaniṣṭhe dve śliṣṭe kamaladalasamete madhyame dve prasārite tarjanyau dve arddhavakre arddhacandrākāre madhyamayoḥ pṛṣṭhabhāge svakaratalagate'nāmike kuñcite'dhaḥ iti pañcaśūka mudrāṃ baddhvā dve'nyonyaṃ kaniṣṭhe viṣamakaratale pṛṣṭhayogena tarjanīmadhyamānāmikāṅguṣṭhayormukhayoga iti guruḍamudrā
analyzed: tathā ca tatra kara saṃpuṭam kṛtvā ṅguṣṭhau śliṣṭau kaniṣṭhe dve śliṣṭe kamala dala samete madhyame dve prasārite tarjanyau dve arddha vakre arddha candra ākāre madhyamayoḥ

original: karapṛṣṭhayogena muṣṭiyoge madhye'ṅguṣṭhau tarjanyoḥ kaniṣṭhayośca parasparamaṅkabandha iti vi pra bhā pṛ . . vi pra bhā pṛ . vi pra bhā pṛ śrīkālacakra bhagavatsādhanavidhiḥ trailokyavijayamudrā
analyzed: kara pṛṣṭha yogena muṣṭi yoge madhye ṅguṣṭhau tarjanyoḥ kaniṣṭhayoḥ ca parasparam aṅkabandhaḥ iti vi pra bhā pṛ vi pra bhā pṛ vi pra bhā pṛ śrī kālacakra bhagavat sādhana

original: tato dakṣiṇavajramuṣṭestarjanyādyaṅgulīścatastra īṣatprasārayediti śvānamudrā

analyzed: aṅguṣṭha kaniṣṭhe tarjanī ādi aṅgulīnām vikāśaḥ catur dala kamala vat iti padma mudrā ubhaya kara tala saṃpuṭena aṅgulīnām ākāreṇa prasāra iti cakra mudrā

original: iti mudrālakṣaṇam

original: 'tata oṃ āḥ hū~ amuka āgaccha śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛha bhuktvā pītvā tṛptiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ gaccha gaccha svāheti
analyzed: tatas om āḥ hū amukaḥ āgaccha śīghram idam valim gṛha bhuktvā pītvā tṛptim kṛtvā sarva sattvānām śāntim kṛtvā sva sthānam gaccha gaccha svāhā iti

original: ayaṃ valimantro deśādhipasya grāmādhipasya ca
analyzed: ayam vali mantraḥ deśa adhipasya grāma adhipasya ca

analyzed: tatra tatra yadi deśasya grāmasya vā tri pañca saptama akṣaraiḥ nām tadā ādi madhya anta akṣara saṃjñayā valim dadyāt

original: atha dvicatuḥ ṣaḍādisamākṣarairnāma bhavettadādyantākṣarasaṃjñayā dadyāt

original: tataḥ pūrvasphāritān krodhānāmukhīkṛtya validānāya mantrapadāni bhavanti
analyzed: tatas pūrva sphāritān krodhān ā mukhīkṛtya vali dānāya mantra padāni bhavanti

original: tathā cāhu: - oṃ ā: hū~ ho: uṣṇīṣasumbhaniśumbhavighrāntakanīladaṇḍaprajñāntakaṭakvirāja- padmānta̭kācalayamāntakamahābalebhyaḥ saparivārebhyaḥ idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho : saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tathā ca āhu om ā hū ho uṣṇīṣa sumbha niśumbha vighrāntaka nīladaṇḍa prajñāntaka ṭakvi rāja padmānta kācala yamāntaka mahābalebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam

original: iti sarvakrodhānāṃ valimantraḥ
analyzed: iti sarva krodhānām vali mantraḥ

original: - tata: ākāśādikṛtsnasiddhānāṃ valimantrapadāni oṃ ā hū~ hāṃ: ākāśavāyuteja udaka pṛthvīsādhitebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas ākāśa ādi kṛtsna siddhānām vali mantra padāni om ā hū hāṃ ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ udaka pṛthvī sādhitebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe te ca

original: tato dikpālānāṃ valimantrapadāni oṃ āḥ hū~ ho: brahmaviṣṇunairṛtyavāyuyamāgnisamudreśvarendrayakṣebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ - vi pra bhā pṛ . . vi pra bhā pṛ . kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas dikpālānām vali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho brahma viṣṇu nairṛtya vāyu yama agni samudra īśvara indra yakṣebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe te

original: tato grahāṇāṃ valimantrapadāni — oṃ āḥ hū~ ho rāhukālāgnicandrasūryabudhamaṅgalaśukravṛhaspatiketuśanibhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas grahāṇām vali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho rāhu kālāgni candra sūrya budha maṅgala śukra vṛhaspati ketu śanibhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe te

original: tato nāgānāṃ valimantrapadāni — oṃ āḥ hū~ ho: jayavijaya - padmakaṭakavāsukiśaṅkhapālakulikānantatakṣakamahāpadmebhyaḥ saparivārebhyaḥ idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu jaḥ hū~ va~ ho : saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas nāgānām vali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho jaya vijaya padma kaṭaka vāsuki śaṅkhapāla kulika ananta takṣaka mahāpadmebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe

original: tato bhūtānāṃ valimantrapadāni - oṃ āḥ hū~ hoḥ vetāḍavikṛtamukha- śvakākaśūkaragṛdhravyāghrolūkajambūkagaruḍamukhebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ valiṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpamakṣataṃ dadāmahe te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ valiṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas bhūtānām vali mantra padāni om āḥ hū hoḥ vetāḍa vikṛtamukha śva kāka śūkara gṛdhra vyāghra ulūka jambūka garuḍa mukhebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam valim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam

original: evaṃ bhūtavalimantra iti
analyzed: evam bhūta vali mantraḥ iti

original: tathā visarjayettathā cāhu: visarjanakāle guhyacakre hā~ a~kāre krodhacakraṃ praveśayediti
analyzed: tathā visarjayet tathā ca āhu visarjana kāle guhya cakre hā a kāre krodhacakram praveśayet iti

original: uṣṇīṣe a~ (a) kāre śūnyakṛtsnādicakram
analyzed: uṣṇīṣe a a kāre śūnya kṛtsna ādi cakram

original: lalāṭe ikāre dikpālacakraṃ kaṇṭhe ṛkāre grahacakram
analyzed: lalāṭe ikāre dikpāla cakram kaṇṭhe ṛkāre graha cakram

original: hṛdaye ukāre nāgacakram
analyzed: hṛdaye ukāre nāga cakram

original: nābhau lṛkāre bhūtacakraṃ praveśayediti visarjanamiti
analyzed: nābhau lṛkāre bhūta cakram praveśayet iti visarjanam iti

original: śrīlokanātha tava bhāṣitamuddhṛtaṃ yad- bāreṇa ( bālena ) mūḍhamatinā smaraṇāya nātha
analyzed: śrī lokanātha tava bhāṣitam uddhṛtam yat bāreṇa bālena mūḍha matinā smaraṇāya nātha

original: tanme prasīda karuṇārdramate kṣamasva tātī yathā svasutacāpalasaṃsahiṣṇuḥ
analyzed: tat me prasīda karuṇā ārdra mate kṣamasva tātī yathā sva suta cāpala saṃsahiṣṇuḥ

original: iti śrīmallokeśvaranirmāṇapuṇḍarīkaviracitavimalaprabhoddhṛtaḥ śrīkālacakra bhagavatsādhanavidhiḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti śrīmat lokeśvara nirmāṇa puṇḍarīka viracita vimala prabhā uddhṛtaḥ śrī kālacakra bhagavat sādhana vidhiḥ samāptaḥ

original: kṛtiriyaṃ kṣmāpāla - gopāla-kirāta-koṭi-ghaṭitacaraṇasarasija- mahāpaṇḍitadharmākaraśāntipādānām
analyzed: kṛtiḥ iyam kṣmāpāla gopāla kirāta koṭi ghaṭita caraṇa sarasija mahā paṇḍita dharma ākara śānti pādānām

original: || śubhamastu sarvadā ||
analyzed: śubham astu sarvadā
